text: They will say ‘Our Lord You have caused us to die twice two deaths and You have given us life twice — for they were lifeless drops of semen then they were given life then made to die then brought back to life for the Resurrection. We now confess our sins in having disbelieved in the Resurrection. Is there then any way to go out?’ out of the Fire and return to the world to be obedient to our Lord? The answer given to them will be No!
